rooms.name: Living and Dining Area

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A well-insulated bedroom designed for privacy and tranquility, incorporating eco-friendly materials and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom design with water-efficient fixtures and sustainable practices. Aligned according to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Library/Study
rooms.description: A quiet library/study area with ample natural light and soundproofing features, designed following Vastu principles for concentration.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed to face the north-east direction for positive energy flow in accordance with Vastu principles.
Direct access to the two-car garage ensuring smooth flow from the living space.
Windows placed along east and south walls to maximize natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Entertainment Space
rooms.description: A flexible space designed for leisure activities and gatherings, incorporating eco-friendly furniture and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Sleeping Nook
rooms.description: A compact sleeping area designed for guest accommodations or additional privacy needs, integrating sustainable building materials.

openings.description: A combination of skylights and large windows to harness natural light while ensuring energy efficiency.
Access to the two-car garage is provided here with ample space for vehicle maneuvering.

notes: This design emphasizes eco-friendly practices including energy efficiency, natural ventilation, and sustainable materials. Vastu principles are integrated through room placements and directional alignments. The overall floor plan respects local building norms while optimizing the available plot area of 40x60 feet.
